interestingcomments.content:
Remote iOS app and the X-T2... /!/ Today both app and firmware received long awaited updates. The app received new features, especially the bluetooth connectivity, but in my experience failed to bug fix core functionality. Even after these new updates the app and camera fails to connect in 9 out of 10 times and when it eventually connects the connection is fidgety and slow. I tried to reset the camera and reinstall the app to no apparent avail. 

Is this a common experience, or is it specific to the X\-T2 and iOS?

interestingcomments.content: fuji cam remote any better with bluetooth? /!/ Have been using the app (and Cascable) over wifi on the x100f, and it's generally horrendous. Especially connectivity, and being able to quickly connect via. For anyone on the x-e3, is the bluetooth performance any better?
